turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some mochas from the Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order mocha from starbuck, sounds good. what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with the grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande mocha, ok ice or hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, let's start over. I actually want a cherry mocha, the size will be a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande cherry mocha right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what type of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any additional flavoring for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add whip cream and bunch of sprinkles on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande cherry mocha with coconut milk with whipped cream and lots of sprinkles on top final order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pick it up at the Starbucks at route 68 you said.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll be That'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
